page.title: 15Stilton Church
page.content: One hot day we walked to Stilton.We were going to see Stilton Church. Stilton Church is different from Folksworth Church in many ways. Stilton Church has a high bell tower and has three small windows above the door at the rear of the church.Also there are marble memorials of the two world wars on the walls and floor at Stilton Church.The pulpits are both different.The Folksworth pulpit has got spiral stairs leading up to it. The reverend takes services at Stilton Church and Folksworth Church. At the church we did sme sketches and we did some rubbings.It was a long walk to Stilton,it took about thirty-five minutes.When we got back to school most of us were very very tired.
